paper_abstract: I-L(r)-optimal designs are described for a kind of hierarchically ordered system of regression models with an r-dimensional response variable y. The components of y may be correlated with a known variance-covariance matrix Sigma. The present results show that I-L(r)-optimal designs for this system of regression models do not depend on Sigma. The I-L(r)-optimal designs are given for the systems of trigonometric and Haar wavelet regression models, respectively. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: I-L(r)-optimal designs for a hierarchically ordered system of regression models
